org.hps.recon.ecal

Class EcalEdepToTriggerConverterDriver

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lcsim.util.Driver
      • org.hps.recon.ecal.EcalEdepToTriggerConverterDriver

  • public class EcalEdepToTriggerConverterDriver
extends Driver
    This file can be used on Monte Carlo and excludes pile up. This makes it useful to study sampling fractions and energy resolution when firing single energy particles at the detector. This file takes the geant4 energy deposition, and converts it to uits of FADC using the pulse integral value and gain (amplitude). The amplitude can include noise if desired. This value is then compared to the readout/trigger thresholds in FADC. Finally,this value is converted back into GeV energy output which can be used for clustering, etc. Original author for test run: Modified from test run to Spring 2015 running:
